class_notes: Permission required for course. Please write directly to the course instructor and, if approved, forward to the CS Graduate Coordinator for a permission code.
course_description: Introduction to analytical techniques for single-cell RNA-sequencing data in cancer, including experimental protocols, data processing, computational analyses.
